trans-unit.source: Represents a reader that provides fast, non-cached, forward-only access to XML data.
trans-unit.target: 表示提供快速、非快取、順向 (Forward-only) 存取 XML 資料的讀取器 (Reader)。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you use the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 從 .NET Framework 2.0 開始，建議您改用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> provides forward-only, read-only access to a stream of XML data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> 提供的 XML 資料流的順向、 唯讀存取。

trans-unit.source: The current node refers to the node on which the reader is positioned.
trans-unit.target: 所謂目前節點，是指讀取器定位所在的節點。

trans-unit.source: The reader is advanced using any of the read methods and properties reflect the value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器進階使用任何讀取的方法和屬性會反映目前節點的值。

trans-unit.source: This class implements <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> and conforms to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 and the Namespaces in XML recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會實作<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>且符合 W3C 可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 和 XML recommendation 中的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: `XmlTextReader` provides the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: `XmlTextReader` 提供下列功能：

trans-unit.source: Enforces the rules of well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: 強制使用的格式正確的 XML。

trans-unit.source: `XmlTextReader` does not provide data validation.
trans-unit.target: `XmlTextReader` 不提供資料驗證。

trans-unit.source: Checks that `DocumentType` nodes are well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 檢查`DocumentType`節點是語式正確。

trans-unit.source: `XmlTextReader` checks the DTD for well-formedness, but does not validate using the DTD.
trans-unit.target: `XmlTextReader` 檢查 DTD 的格式正確性，但不會驗證使用 DTD。

trans-unit.source: For nodes where <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.NodeType%2A> is `XmlNodeType.EntityReference`, a single empty `EntityReference` node is returned (that is, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Value%2A> property is `String.Empty`).
trans-unit.target: 節點位置<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.NodeType%2A>是`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`，單一的空白`EntityReference`則會傳回節點 (也就是<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Value%2A>屬性是`String.Empty`)。

trans-unit.source: The actual declarations of entities in the DTD are called `Entity` nodes.
trans-unit.target: DTD 中的實體的實際宣告稱為`Entity`節點。

trans-unit.source: When you refer to these nodes in your data, they are called `EntityReference` nodes.
trans-unit.target: 當您在資料中參考這些節點時，它們就會呼叫`EntityReference`節點。

trans-unit.source: Does not expand default attributes.
trans-unit.target: 不會展開預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: Because the `XmlTextReader` does not perform the extra checks required for data validation, it provides a fast well-formedness parser.
trans-unit.target: 因為`XmlTextReader`不會執行資料驗證所需的額外檢查它所提供的快速語式剖析器。

trans-unit.source: To perform data validation, use a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行資料驗證，請使用 驗證<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: To read XML data from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, use <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取 XML 資料從<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeReader>。

trans-unit.source: `XmlTextReader` throws an <xref:System.Xml.XmlException> on XML parse errors.
trans-unit.target: `XmlTextReader` 擲回<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>xml 剖析錯誤。

trans-unit.source: After an exception is thrown the state of the reader is not predictable.
trans-unit.target: 擲回例外狀況之後讀取器的狀態不是可預測的。

trans-unit.source: For example, the reported node type may be different than the actual node type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 例如，報告的節點類型可能不同於目前節點的實際節點類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadState%2A> property to check whether a reader is in error state.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadState%2A>屬性來檢查讀取器是否處於錯誤狀態。

trans-unit.source: Security Considerations
trans-unit.target: 安全性考量

trans-unit.source: The following are things to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> class.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用時的考慮事項<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>類別。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> can disclose path information that you do not want bubbled up to the application.
trans-unit.target: 擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>可以揭露您不想要的路徑資訊反昇至應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Your applications must catch exceptions and process them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式必須捕捉例外狀況並予以適當處理。

trans-unit.source: DTD processing is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: DTD 處理預設會啟用。

trans-unit.source: Disable DTD processing if you are concerned about Denial of Service issues or if you are dealing with untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: 停用 DTD 處理，如果您擔心阻絕服務問題，或如果您正在處理不受信任的來源。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing%2A> property to <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Prohibit> to disable DTD processing.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing%2A>屬性<xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Prohibit>停用 DTD 處理。

trans-unit.source: If you have DTD processing enabled, you can use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> to restrict the resources that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> can access.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用 DTD 處理，則可使用 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> 限制 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> 可存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: You can also design your application so that the XML processing is memory and time constrained.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以設計應用程式，讓 XML 處理具有記憶體和時間限制。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure time-out limits in your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 ASP.NET 應用程式中設定逾時限制。

trans-unit.source: XML data can include references to external resources such as a DTD file.
trans-unit.target: XML 資料可以包括外部資源，例如 DTD 檔案的參考。

trans-unit.source: By default external resources are resolved using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> object with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 依預設，外部資源會使用不具使用者認證的 <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> 物件來解析。

trans-unit.source: You can secure this further by doing one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過執行下列其中一項作業，進一步保護它：

trans-unit.source: Restrict the resources that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> can access by setting the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlResolver%2A> property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> 屬性設為 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlResolver%2A> 物件，限制 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> 可以存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: Do not allow the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to open any external resources by setting the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlResolver%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 藉由將 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 屬性設為 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlResolver%2A>，來禁止 `null` 開啟外部資源。

trans-unit.source: XML data can contain a large number of attributes, namespace declarations, nested elements and so on that require a substantial amount of time to process.
trans-unit.target: XML 資料可以包含需要相當長時間來處理的大量屬性、命名空間宣告、巢狀項目等。

trans-unit.source: To limit the size of the input that is sent to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>, create a custom IStream implementation and supply it the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.
trans-unit.target: 若要限制的輸入會傳送至大小<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>、 建立自訂 IStream 實作，並提供<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A> method can be used to handle large streams of data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadValueChunk%2A>方法可以用來處理資料的大量資料流。

trans-unit.source: This method reads a small number of characters at a time instead of allocating a single string for the whole value.
trans-unit.target: 此方法每次會讀取較少數量的字元，而不是為整個值配置單一字串。

trans-unit.source: By default general entities are not expanded.
trans-unit.target: 依預設不會展開一般實體。

trans-unit.source: General entities are expanded when you call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ResolveEntity%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ResolveEntity%2A> 方法時，會展開一般實體。

trans-unit.source: This class has an inheritance demand.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別具有繼承要求。

trans-unit.source: Full trust is required to inherit from <see langword="XmlTextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任才能繼承自<see langword="XmlTextReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料流初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: It is assumed that the `TextReader` is already set to the correct encoding.
trans-unit.target: 它假設已將 `TextReader` 設定為正確的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: This is used by clients that have already read some things from the stream in a multi-part MIME scenario.
trans-unit.target: 這是已經從資料流中的多部分 MIME 案例閱讀某些作業的用戶端使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads an XML string into the `XmlTextReader` object using the <xref:System.IO.StringReader> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會載入至 XML 字串`XmlTextReader`物件使用<xref:System.IO.StringReader>類別。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.BaseURI" /> 設為這個值。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檔案，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: If the file is located on a resource that requires access credentials, use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlResolver%2A> property to specify the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案位於需要存取認證的資源上，使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.XmlResolver%2A>屬性來指定所需的認證。

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], partially trusted code cannot set the `XmlResolver` property.
trans-unit.target: 1.1 版中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，部分信任的程式碼不能設定`XmlResolver`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The workaround is to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with the necessary credentials, pass the URI to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and then construct the `XmlTextReader` using the resulting <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: 解決方式是建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>與所需的認證傳遞至 URI<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver.GetEntity%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，並再建構`XmlTextReader`使用產生<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件。

trans-unit.source: The workaround is described in the following C# code.
trans-unit.target: 因應措施是下列 C# 程式碼中所述。

trans-unit.source: Any valid element content (for example, any combination of elements, comments, processing instructions, CDATA sections, text, and entity references).
trans-unit.target: 任何有效的項目內容 （例如，項目、 註解、 處理指示、 CDATA 區段、 文字和實體參考的任何組合）。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to specify the encoding for the XML fragment, rather than having to set it on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlParserContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您指定的編碼方式的 XML 片段，而不是不必上設定<xref:System.Xml.XmlParserContext>物件。

trans-unit.target: 完整的 XML 文件內容。

trans-unit.source: This enforces document level rules.
trans-unit.target: 這會強制執行文件層級的規則。

trans-unit.source: The reader uses the following to determine the encoding of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器會使用下列來決定資料流的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Checks the <xref:System.Xml.XmlParserContext.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine the encoding.
trans-unit.target: 檢查<xref:System.Xml.XmlParserContext.Encoding%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If the `Encoding` property is `null`, the reader checks for a byte-order mark at the beginning of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Encoding`屬性是`null`，讀取器已檢查的資料流開頭的位元組順序標記。

trans-unit.source: If the `Encoding` property is `null`, and no byte-order mark is found, the reader assumes the stream is encoded in UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Encoding`屬性是`null`，並找到沒有位元組順序標記、 讀取器會假設資料流以 utf-8 編碼。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.

trans-unit.source: A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places.
trans-unit.target: 網路的 XML 文件由使用各種 W3C 標準包含機制彙總的資料區塊組成，因此包含來自不同位置的節點。

trans-unit.source: DTD entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs.
trans-unit.target: DTD 實體就是一個範例，但這並不限於使用 Dtd。

trans-unit.source: The base URI tells you where these nodes came from.
trans-unit.target: 基底 URI 會告訴您這些節點的來源。

trans-unit.source: If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), `String.Empty` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果是要傳回的節點沒有基底 URI （例如，它們從字串中剖析記憶體中），`String.Empty`傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the base URI for each of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示每個節點的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `baseuri.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`baseuri.xml`作為輸入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> implements the binary content read methods.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 是否會實作二進位內容讀取方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the binary content read methods are implemented; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作二進位內容讀取方法，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> class always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 類別一律會傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: The binary content read methods include the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadElementContentAsBinHex%2A> methods.

trans-unit.source: If this reader was constructed using a stream, this method also calls `Close` on the underlying stream.

trans-unit.source: If `Close` has already been called, no action is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Close`已經過呼叫，會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.DtdProcessing" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.DtdProcessing" /> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.DtdProcessing" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.DtdProcessing" /> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing> enumeration contains the <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Prohibit>, <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Ignore>, and <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Parse> enumerators.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing>列舉型別包含<xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Prohibit>， <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Ignore>，和<xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Parse>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Parse> is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Parse> 是預設行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing%2A> property replaces the `ProhibitDTD` property and adds the ability to ignore the DOCTYPE element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing%2A>屬性取代`ProhibitDTD`屬性，並將會忽略文件類型元素的能力。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Ignore?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> will not report the DTDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Xml.DtdProcessing.Ignore?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>將不會報告 Dtd。

trans-unit.source: This means that the DTD/DOCTYPE will be lost on output.
trans-unit.target: 這表示 DTD/文件類型將會遺失輸出上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encoding of the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得文件的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The encoding value.
trans-unit.target: 編碼值。

trans-unit.source: If no encoding attribute exists, and there is no byte-order mark, this defaults to UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 如果編碼屬性不存在，而且沒有位元組順序標記，則此值預設為 UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> uses the <xref:System.Text.Encoding?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, `XmlTextReader` also supports all encodings supported by that class.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別`XmlTextReader`也支援該類別所支援的所有編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The exception to this is any encoding, such as UTF-7 or EBCDIC, that maps the `<?xml` sequence to different byte values than UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況是任何編碼方式，例如 utf-7 或對應的 EBCDIC`<?xml`比 utf-8 不同位元組值的順序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the reader handles entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示讀取器如何處理實體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.EntityHandling" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.EntityHandling" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If no <see langword="EntityHandling" /> is specified, it defaults to <see langword="EntityHandling.ExpandCharEntities" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 <see langword="EntityHandling" />，則會預設為 <see langword="EntityHandling.ExpandCharEntities" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed on the fly and takes effect after the next <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性之後可以變更立即和採用效果在下一個<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When `EntityHandling` is set to `ExpandCharEntities`, attribute values are only partially normalized.
trans-unit.target: 當`EntityHandling`設`ExpandCharEntities`，屬性值僅部分會正規化。

trans-unit.source: The reader normalizes each individual text node independently from the content of adjacent entity reference nodes.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器會正規化每個個別的文字節點，獨立於相鄰的實體參考節點的內容。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> does a buffered `Read`, it must be able to return the remainder of the unused buffer so that no data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>未緩衝`Read`，它必須能夠傳回的未使用的緩衝區的其餘部分，所以不會遺失資料。

trans-unit.source: This allows protocols (such as multi-part MIME) to package XML in the same stream as other things.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓封裝在相同的資料流，做為其他項目中的 XML 通訊協定 （例如多重部分 MIME)。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.EOF%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法後,<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.EOF%2A>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The position indicated is the first character of text in the markup.
trans-unit.target: 指定的位置是文字的在標記中的第一個字元。

trans-unit.source: On the first line of the preceding XML text, a `LinePosition` of `2` corresponds to the character `r`; on the second line, a `LinePosition` of `5` corresponds to the character `t`; and on the third line, a `LinePosition` of `3` corresponds to the character `r`.
trans-unit.target: 先前的 XML 文字，第一行上`LinePosition`的`2`對應於字元`r`; 在第二行，`LinePosition`的`5`對應於字元`t`; 在第三行`LinePosition`的`3`對應於字元`r`。

trans-unit.source: Combined with <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.LineNumber%2A>, a value of `1,1` indicates the start of the document.
trans-unit.target: 結合<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.LineNumber%2A>，值為`1,1`表示文件的開頭。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: All node and attribute names returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> are atomized using the `NameTable`.
trans-unit.target: 從傳回的所有節點和屬性名稱<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>使用原子化`NameTable`。

trans-unit.source: When the same name is returned multiple times (for example, `Customer`), then the same `String` object is returned for that name.
trans-unit.target: 相同的名稱傳回多次時 (例如， `Customer`)，然後相同`String`會傳回物件，該名稱。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible for you to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings instead of expensive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您撰寫有效率的程式碼，進行物件比較這些字串，而不是高度耗費資源的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to normalize white space and attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指示是否將空白字元與屬性值正常化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to normalize; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要正常化，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at any time and takes effect on the next read operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可以隨時變更，而且會在下一步的讀取作業上生效。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> is used to construct an <xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>, to normalize attribute values, `Normalization` must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>用來建構<xref:System.Xml.XmlValidatingReader>，若要將屬性值正常化`Normalization`必須設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If `Normalization` is set to `false`, this also disables character range checking for numeric entities.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Normalization`設`false`，這也會停用檢查數值實體的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: As a result, character entities, such as `�`, are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，字元實體，例如`�`，允許。

trans-unit.source: The following describes attribute value normalization:
trans-unit.target: 以下描述屬性值正常化：

trans-unit.source: For a character reference, append the referenced character to the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 對於字元參考，請將參考的字元附加到屬性值中。

trans-unit.source: For an entity reference, recursively process the replacement text of the entity.
trans-unit.target: 對於實體參考，請以遞迴處理實體的取代文字。

trans-unit.source: For a white space character (#x20, #xD, #xA, #x9), append #x20 to the normalized value.
trans-unit.target: 空格字元 （#x、 #xD、 #xA、 #x），將 #x 附加至正規化值。

trans-unit.source: (Only a single #x20 is appended for a "#xD#xA" sequence that is part of an external parsed entity or the literal entity value of an internal parsed entity.)
trans-unit.target: （只有單一 #x 附加為外部剖析實體的一部分或內部剖析實體的常值的實體值"#xD #xA"順序）。

trans-unit.source: Process other characters by appending them to the normalized value.
trans-unit.target: 處理其他字元，請將它們附加至正規化值中。

trans-unit.source: If the declared value is not CDATA, discard any leading and trailing space (#x20) characters and replace sequences of space (#x20) characters with a single space (#x20) character.
trans-unit.target: 如果宣告的值不是 CDATA，捨棄任何開頭和尾端的空格 (#x) 字元和空格 (# #x) 字元的序列取代為單一空白字元 (# #x)。

trans-unit.source: The `XmlTextReader` only performs attribute or CDATA normalization.
trans-unit.target: `XmlTextReader`只會執行屬性或 CDATA 正規化。

trans-unit.source: It does not do DTD-specific normalization unless wrapped within an `XmlValidatingReader`.
trans-unit.target: 它不會執行特定的 DTD 正規化，除非包裝內`XmlValidatingReader`。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the W3C XML 1.0 recommendation for further discussion on normalization.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 W3C XML 1.0 recommendation 的進一步討論正規化。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows reader behavior with normalization turned on and then off.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示讀取器行為正規化為開啟，然後關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow DTD processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否允許 DTD 處理。

trans-unit.source: This property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing" /> instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.DtdProcessing" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to disallow DTD processing; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示不允許 DTD 處理，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: DTD processing is enabled by default for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: DTD 處理預設會啟用為回溯相容性。

trans-unit.source: However, unless your application requires DTD processing, you should disable this setting.
trans-unit.target: 不過，除非您的應用程式需要 DTD 處理，您應該停用此設定。

trans-unit.source: Disabling DTD processing can be useful in preventing certain denial of service attacks.
trans-unit.target: 在防止某些阻斷服務攻擊時，停用 DTD 處理會很有用。

trans-unit.source: If set to `true`, the reader throws an <xref:System.Xml.XmlException> when any DTD content is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為`true`，讀取器會擲回<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>時遇到任何 DTD 內容。

trans-unit.source: If you have DTD processing enabled, you need to be aware of including DTDs from untrusted sources and possible denial of service attacks.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已啟用 DTD 處理，您需要注意的 dtd 從受信任的來源和可能的阻絕服務攻擊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> to restrict the resources that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> can access.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>，限制的資源，<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>可以存取。

trans-unit.source: You can also design your application so that the XML processing is memory and time constrained.
trans-unit.target: 您還可以設計應用程式，讓 XML 處理具有記憶體和時間限制。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure time-out limits in your ASP.NET application
trans-unit.target: 例如，ASP.NET 應用程式中設定逾時限制

trans-unit.source: Gets the quotation mark character used to enclose the value of an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來括住屬性節點值的引號字元。

trans-unit.source: The quotation mark character (" or ') used to enclose the value of an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 用來括住屬性節點值的引號字元 (" 或 ')。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only to an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於屬性節點。

trans-unit.source: Reads the next node from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 從資料流讀取下一個節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the next node was read successfully; <see langword="false" /> if there are no more nodes to read.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功讀取下一個節點，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果沒有其他節點可讀取，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: When a reader is first created and initialized, there is no information available.
trans-unit.target: 當讀取器第一次建立並初始化時，沒有任何可用資訊。

trans-unit.source: You must call `Read` to read the first node.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫`Read`讀取的第一個節點。

trans-unit.source: This method requires at least four bytes from the data stream in order to begin parsing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法需要從資料流至少四個位元組，才能開始剖析。

trans-unit.source: If fewer than four bytes are returned and there is no more data in the stream, the method will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回少於四個位元組資料流中沒有詳細資料，該方法會失敗。

trans-unit.source: If there is more data in the stream, the method will block parsing until receipt of the fourth byte.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流中有更多資料，方法會封鎖直到接收第四個位元組的剖析。

trans-unit.source: Parses the attribute value into one or more <see langword="Text" />, <see langword="EntityReference" />, or <see langword="EndEntity" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 將屬性值剖析成一或多個 <see langword="Text" />、<see langword="EntityReference" /> 或 <see langword="EndEntity" /> 節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there are nodes to return.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回的是節點，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the reader is not positioned on an attribute node when the initial call is made or if all the attribute values have been read.
trans-unit.target: 如果在初次呼叫時讀取器不位於屬性節點上，或已讀取所有屬性值，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An empty attribute, such as, <c>misc=""</c>, returns <see langword="true" /> with a single node with a value of <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 針對含有 <see langword="String.Empty" /> 值的單一節點，空白的屬性 (例如 <c>misc=""</c>) 會傳回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: Use this method after calling `MoveToAttribute` to read through the text or entity reference nodes that make up the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法之後呼叫`MoveToAttribute`閱讀組成屬性值的文字或實體參考節點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Depth%2A> of the attribute value nodes is one plus the depth of the attribute node; it increments and decrements by one when you step into and out of general entity references.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Depth%2A>的屬性值節點是一個加上該屬性節點的深度，則它會自動遞增和遞減 1 當您逐步執行和跳離一般實體參考。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.

trans-unit.source: Like <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadChars%2A>, this method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadChars%2A>，這個方法可以連續呼叫來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。

trans-unit.source: It decodes Base64 content and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 它將 Base64 內容解碼，並傳回解碼的二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 Base64 編碼的 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: See RFC 1521.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 RFC 1521。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.

trans-unit.source: Like <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadChars%2A>, this method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text.
trans-unit.target: 像<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadChars%2A>，這個方法可以連續呼叫來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。

trans-unit.source: It decodes `BinHex` content and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `BinHex` encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 它會解碼`BinHex`內容，並傳回解碼的二進位位元組 (例如，內嵌`BinHex`編碼的 GIF 影像) 到緩衝區。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="BinHex" /> 序列無效。

trans-unit.source: The array of characters that serves as the buffer to which the text contents are written.
trans-unit.target: 做為寫入文字內容之緩衝區的字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The position within <c>buffer</c> where the method can begin writing text contents.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 內的位置；方法可在這裡開始寫入文字內容。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to write into <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入 <c>buffer</c> 的字元數。

trans-unit.source: Reads the text contents of an element into a character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 將項目的文字內容讀入字元緩衝區中。

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to read large streams of embedded text by calling it successively.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法設計可藉由連續呼叫來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的字元數。

trans-unit.source: This can be <see langword="0" /> if the reader is not positioned on an element or if there is no more text content to return in the current context.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器不在項目上，或者目前內容中沒有其他可傳回的文字內容，則這個數目可為 <see langword="0" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This is the most efficient way to process very large streams of text embedded in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 這是最有效率的方式可以處理非常大的資料流的 XML 文件中的內嵌文字。

trans-unit.source: Rather than allocating large string objects, `ReadChars` returns text content a buffer at a time.
trans-unit.target: 而不是配置大型的字串物件`ReadChars`一次將緩衝區傳回的文字內容。

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to work only on element nodes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被為了只能用於元素節點。

trans-unit.source: Other node types cause `ReadChars` to return `0`.
trans-unit.target: 其他節點類型都會造成`ReadChars`傳回`0`。

trans-unit.source: In the following XML, if the reader is positioned on the start tag, `ReadChars` returns `test` and positions the reader after the end tag.
trans-unit.target: 在下列 XML 中，如果讀取器位於開始標記、`ReadChars`傳回`test`，並將讀取器置於結束標記的後面。

trans-unit.source: `ReadChars` has the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: `ReadChars` 具有下列功能：

trans-unit.source: This method is designed to work on element nodes only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法被為了在只有項目節點上運作。

trans-unit.source: Other node types cause `ReadChars` to return 0.
trans-unit.target: 其他節點類型都會造成`ReadChars`傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the actual character content.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回實際的字元內容。

trans-unit.source: There is no attempt to resolve entities, CDATA, or any other markup encountered.
trans-unit.target: 不會解析實體、 CDATA 或發生的任何其他標記。

trans-unit.source: `ReadChars` returns everything between the start tag and the end tag, including markup.
trans-unit.target: `ReadChars` 傳回的所有項目開始標記與結束標記，包括標記之間。

trans-unit.source: `ReadChars` ignores XML markup that is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: `ReadChars` 會忽略格式不正確的 XML 標記。

trans-unit.source: For example, when reading the following XML string `12`, `ReadChars` returns `12`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當讀取下列 XML 字串`12`，`ReadChars`傳回`12`。

trans-unit.source: (It returns markup from the matching element pair and ignores others.)
trans-unit.target: （它傳回的相符項目組標記，並忽略其他人。）

trans-unit.source: This method does not do any normalization.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會進行任何正規化。

trans-unit.source: When `ReadChars` has reached the end of the character stream, it returns the value 0 and the reader is positioned after the end tag.
trans-unit.target: 當`ReadChars`已達結束的字元資料流中，它會傳回值 0 和讀取器定位於結束標記的後面。

trans-unit.source: Attribute read methods are not available while using `ReadChars`.
trans-unit.target: 讀取屬性的方法是不使用時`ReadChars`。

trans-unit.source: For example, using the following XML:
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用下列 XML:

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned on the `<item>` element at the end of the while loop.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器位於`<item>`項目結尾的 while 迴圈。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads in XML using `ReadChars`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中使用 XML 讀取`ReadChars`。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the `items.xml` file as input.
trans-unit.target: 該範例使用 `items.xml` 檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is greater than the space specified in the <paramref name="buffer" /> (buffer size - <paramref name="index" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" /> 中指定的空間 (緩衝區大小 - <paramref name="index" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> <see langword="< 0" /> or <paramref name="count" /><see langword="< 0" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> <see langword="< 0" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /><see langword="< 0" />。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的文字複製到其中的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中開始複製結果的位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要複製至緩衝區中的最大位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 從這個方法傳回所複製的實際位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Reads the content and returns the <see langword="Base64" /> decoded binary bytes.
trans-unit.target: 讀取內容，並傳回 <see langword="Base64" /> 已解碼的二進位位元組。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 寫入緩衝區的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This method streams the content, decodes the `Base64` content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `Base64`-encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法內容串流、 解碼`Base64`內容，並傳回解碼的二進位位元組 (例如，內嵌`Base64`-編碼的 GIF 影像) 到緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以連續呼叫來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies".
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 部分一個： 機制來指定，並描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org).
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得從 Rfc[註解的網站要求](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。

trans-unit.source: You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> method until the method returns the value 0.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該存取的任何呼叫之間的讀取器屬性<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>方法，直到該方法會傳回值為 0。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有下列行為：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> 當它到達它所操作的位元組資料流結尾傳回 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: The reader is positioned on the first non-content node.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器第一個非內容節點上。

trans-unit.source: If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尋求更少，或的確實數目，也會保留在資料流讀取位元組會保留在其目前位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> is not supported on the following XML node types: `Element`, `XmlDeclaration`, `None`, `Document`, `DocumentType`, `Notation`, `Entity`, `DocumentFragment`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> 不支援下列的 XML 節點類型： `Element`， `XmlDeclaration`， `None`， `Document`， `DocumentType`， `Notation`， `Entity`， `DocumentFragment`。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> is not supported in the current node.
trans-unit.target: 目前的節點不支援 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區的索引或是索引 + 計數大於所配置的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的文字複製到其中的緩衝區。

trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBinHex(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> is not supported on the current node.
trans-unit.target: 目前的節點不支援 <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBinHex(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區的索引或是索引 + 計數大於所配置的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> implementation does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 實作不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的文字複製到其中的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中開始複製結果的位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要複製至緩衝區中的最大位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 從這個方法傳回所複製的實際位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Reads the element and decodes the Base64 content.
trans-unit.target: 讀取項目，並將 Base64 內容解碼。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 寫入緩衝區的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the element content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法讀取的項目內容中，使用 Base64 編碼方式，將其解碼，並傳回已解碼的二進位位元組 （例如，內嵌 Base64 編碼的 GIF 影像） 到緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies".
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 部分一個： 機制來指定，並描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org).
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得從 Rfc[註解的網站要求](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。

trans-unit.source: This method can only read simple-content elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只能讀取簡單內容項目。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以包含文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元、 CDATA 區段中，註解和處理指示。

trans-unit.source: It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以包含實體參考，會自動展開。

trans-unit.source: The element cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 項目不能有子項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A> method except that it can only be called on element node types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是非常類似於<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBase64%2A>元素節點型別上只能呼叫只是它的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`值高於在文件中的位元組數目，或如果是，文件中的位元組數目等於<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>讀取文件中所有剩餘的位元組，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EndElement>.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>方法呼叫會傳回零，並將讀取器移至節點下<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EndElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A> before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>已耗用所有的項目內容之前，讀取器可能如同所耗用的第一個內容，然後<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the reader reads all the text until the end element is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 這表示讀取器讀取的所有文字，直到遇到結束項目。

trans-unit.source: It then reads the end tag node, reads the next node, and then positions itself on the next subsequent node.
trans-unit.target: 然後讀取結束標記節點，讀取的下一個節點，並再將本身置於下一步的後續節點。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to see an example using this method.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBase64%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>若要查看使用這個方法的範例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current node is not an element node.
trans-unit.target: 目前的節點不是項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區的索引或是索引 + 計數大於所配置的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> implementation does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextReader" /> 實作不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The element contains mixed-content.
trans-unit.target: 項目包含混合內容。

trans-unit.source: The content cannot be converted to the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 內容無法轉換成要求的類型。

trans-unit.source: The buffer into which to copy the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的文字複製到其中的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: This value cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the buffer where to start copying the result.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區中開始複製結果的位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to copy into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 要複製至緩衝區中的最大位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes copied is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: 從這個方法傳回所複製的實際位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Reads the element and decodes the <see langword="BinHex" /> content.
trans-unit.target: 讀取項目，並將 <see langword="BinHex" /> 內容解碼。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes written to the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 寫入緩衝區的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This method reads the element content, decodes it using `BinHex` encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `BinHex` encoded GIF image) into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會讀取的項目內容、 使用將其解碼`BinHex`編碼，並傳回解碼的二進位位元組 (例如，內嵌`BinHex`編碼的 GIF 影像) 到緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: This method can only read simple-content elements.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只能讀取簡單內容項目。

trans-unit.source: The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 項目可以包含文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元、 CDATA 區段中，註解和處理指示。

trans-unit.source: It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以包含實體參考，會自動展開。

trans-unit.source: The element cannot have child elements.
trans-unit.target: 項目不能有子項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A> method except that it can only be called on element node types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是非常類似於<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadContentAsBinHex%2A>元素節點型別上只能呼叫只是它的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果`count`值高於在文件中的位元組數目，或如果是，文件中的位元組數目等於<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>讀取文件中所有剩餘的位元組，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EndElement>.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>方法呼叫會傳回零，並將讀取器移至節點下<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType.EndElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A> before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>已耗用所有的項目內容之前，讀取器可能如同所耗用的第一個內容，然後<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: This means that the reader reads all the text until the end element is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 這表示讀取器讀取的所有文字，直到遇到結束項目。

trans-unit.source: It then reads the end tag node, reads the next node, and then positions itself on the next subsequent node.
trans-unit.target: 然後讀取結束標記節點，讀取的下一個節點，並再將本身置於下一步的後續節點。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBinHex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to see an example using this method.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadElementContentAsBinHex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>若要查看使用這個方法的範例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="buffer" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current node is not an element node.
trans-unit.target: 目前的節點不是項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The index into the buffer or index + count is larger than the allocated buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區的索引或是索引 + 計數大於所配置的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> implementation does not support this method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 實作不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The element contains mixed-content.
trans-unit.target: 項目包含混合內容。

trans-unit.source: The content cannot be converted to the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 內容無法轉換成要求的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the reader.
trans-unit.target: 取得讀取器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.ReadState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.ReadState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: Reads the contents of an element or a text node as a string.
trans-unit.target: 將項目或文字節點的內容當做字串讀取。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the element or text node.
trans-unit.target: 項目或文字節點的內容。

trans-unit.source: This can be an empty string if the reader is positioned on something other than an element or text node, or if there is no more text content to return in the current context.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器不在項目或文字節點上，或目前內容中沒有其他可傳回的文字內容，則可為空字串。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Note:" /> The text node can be either an element or an attribute text node.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Note:" /> 文字節點可為項目或屬性文字節點。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and `CData` section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content.
trans-unit.target: 如果位於項目，`ReadString`串連所有文字、 顯著泛空白字元，泛空白字元和`CData`區段節點型別一起，並傳回串連的項目內容資料。

trans-unit.source: It stops when any markup is encountered, including comments and processing instructions.
trans-unit.target: 它會停止時遇到任何標記，包括註解和處理指示。

trans-unit.source: This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會發生於混合內容模型中，或是讀取項目結束標記時。

trans-unit.source: If positioned on a text node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字節點上，位於`ReadString`執行相同的串連文字節點從至指定的項目結束標記。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器定位於屬性文字節點上，則 `ReadString` 具有相同的功能，就像讀取器定位於項目開始標記上一樣。

trans-unit.source: It returns all the concatenated element text nodes.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回所有串連的項目文字節點。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the text content of each element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示每個項目的文字內容。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `elems.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`elems.xml`作為輸入。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while parsing the XML.
trans-unit.target: 剖析 XML 時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: An invalid operation was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試了無效的作業。

trans-unit.source: Resets the state of the reader to ReadState.Initial.
trans-unit.target: 將讀取器的狀態重設為 ReadState.Initial。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to parse multiple XML documents in a single stream.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您剖析多個單一資料流中的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: When you reach the end of an XML document, you can call `ResetState` to reset the state of the reader in preparation for the next XML document.
trans-unit.target: 當您到達的 XML 文件結尾時，您可以呼叫`ResetState`重設以準備進行下一個 XML 文件讀取器的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The documents in the stream must share the same encoding.
trans-unit.target: 資料流中的文件必須共用相同的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If this is not the case, when `ResetState` is called an <xref:System.Xml.XmlException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這不是如此，當`ResetState`稱為<xref:System.Xml.XmlException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: (This is a change in behavior from .NET Framework version 1.1 and earlier).
trans-unit.target: （這是.NET Framework 1.1 版或更早版本的行為變更。）

trans-unit.source: The following properties are not affected by `ResetState`.
trans-unit.target: 下列屬性不會受到`ResetState`。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses two XML documents in a single stream.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會剖析單一資料流中的兩個 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: Calling <see langword="ResetState" /> if the reader was constructed using an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlParserContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlParserContext" /> 來建構讀取器，則呼叫 <see langword="ResetState" />。

trans-unit.source: Documents in a single stream do not share the same encoding.
trans-unit.target: 單一資料流中的文件不會共用同一種編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Resolves the entity reference for <see langword="EntityReference" /> nodes.
trans-unit.target: 解析 <see langword="EntityReference" /> 節點的實體參考。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on an `EntityReference` node (`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`), if <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A> is called after calling this method, the entity replacement text is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於`EntityReference`節點 (`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`)，如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>呼叫此方法中，實體取代文字會剖析之後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When the entity replacement text is finished, an `EndEntity` node is returned to close the entity reference scope.
trans-unit.target: 實體取代文字完成時，`EndEntity`關閉實體參考範圍，則會傳回節點。

trans-unit.source: After calling this method, if the entity is part of an attribute value, you must call <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A> to step into the entity.
trans-unit.target: 之後呼叫這個方法，如果實體是一部分的屬性值，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadAttributeValue%2A>逐步執行至實體。

trans-unit.source: Skips the children of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 略過目前節點的子節點。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: In the following XML input if the reader is positioned on the `<a>` node or any of its attributes, calling `Skip` positions the reader to the `<b>` node.
trans-unit.target: 下列 xml 輸入如果讀取器位於`<a>`節點或其任何屬性，呼叫`Skip`若要將讀取器放置`<b>`節點。

trans-unit.source: If the reader is positioned on a leaf node already (such as the `<x>` node or the text node `abc`), calling `Skip` is the same as calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果讀取器位於分葉節點上已 (例如`<x>`節點或文字節點`abc`)，則呼叫`Skip`等同於呼叫<xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for well-formed XML.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查格式正確的 XML。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope" /> value that specifies the type of namespace nodes to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope" /> 值，指定要傳回之命名空間節點的類型。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.GetNamespacesInScope(System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.GetNamespacesInScope(System.Xml.XmlNamespaceScope)" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the current in-scope namespaces.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含目前範圍內的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The prefix whose namespace URI you wish to find.
trans-unit.target: 您要尋找其命名空間 URI 的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupNamespace(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupNamespace(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI that is mapped to the prefix; <see langword="null" /> if the prefix is not mapped to a namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 對應至前置詞的命名空間 URI，如果前置詞未對應至命名空間 URI，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI whose prefix you wish to find.
trans-unit.target: 您要尋找其前置詞的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupPrefix(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver.LookupPrefix(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: The prefix that is mapped to the namespace URI; <see langword="null" /> if the namespace URI is not mapped to a prefix.
trans-unit.target: 對應至命名空間 URI 的前置詞，如果命名空間 URI 未對應至前置詞，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前節點的文字值。

trans-unit.source: The value returned depends on the <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.NodeType" /> of the node.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值需視節點的 <see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.NodeType" /> 而定。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists node types that have a value to return.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出具有傳回值的節點類型。

trans-unit.source: All other node types return <see langword="String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有其他節點類型都會傳回 <see langword="String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="Comment" /></term><description> The content of the comment.

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term><see langword="DocumentType" /></term><description> The internal subset.

trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term><see langword="ProcessingInstruction" /></term><description> 整個內容 （目標除外）。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads an XML file and displays each node.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取 XML 檔案，並顯示每個節點。

trans-unit.source: The sample uses the file `items.xml`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用檔案`items.xml`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how white space is handled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定如何處理空白字元。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.WhitespaceHandling" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="WhitespaceHandling.All" /> (returns <see langword="Whitespace" /> and <see langword="SignificantWhitespace" /> nodes).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="WhitespaceHandling.All" /> (傳回 <see langword="Whitespace" /> 與 <see langword="SignificantWhitespace" /> 節點)。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at any time and takes effect on the next read operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可以隨時變更，而且會在下一步的讀取作業上生效。

trans-unit.source: Because the `XmlTextReader` does not have DTD information available to it, `SignificantWhitepsace` nodes are only returned within an `xml:space='preserve'` scope.
trans-unit.target: 因為`XmlTextReader`沒有 DTD 資訊可用，`SignificantWhitepsace`內只會傳回節點`xml:space='preserve'`範圍。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads an XML fragment.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取 XML 片段。

trans-unit.source: Invalid value specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值無效。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property when the reader is closed (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadState" /> is <see langword="ReadState.Closed" />).
trans-unit.target: 在讀取器關閉時設定這個屬性 (<see cref="P:System.Xml.XmlTextReader.ReadState" /> 為 <see langword="ReadState.Closed" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see langword="xml:lang" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.source: The current <see langword="xml:lang" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see langword="xml:lang" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: This property represents the `xml:lang` scope within which the current node resides.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性代表`xml:lang`內目前的節點所在的範圍。

trans-unit.source: For example, here is an XML fragment with `xml:lang` set to US English in the root element:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下是使用 XML 片段`xml:lang`根項目設定為 英文 （美國）：

trans-unit.source: \<root xml:lang="en-us">
trans-unit.target: \<根 xml: lang ="en-我們">

trans-unit.source: \<name>Fred\</name>
trans-unit.target: \<名稱 > Fred \< /名稱 >

trans-unit.source: \</root>
trans-unit.target: \</root>

trans-unit.source: When the reader is positioned on the `name` element, you can use this property to find that it is in the scope of a US English `xml:lang` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 當讀取器位於`name`項目，您可以使用這個屬性來尋找它位於範圍內的美式英文`xml:lang`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the `xml:lang` value for each of the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示`xml:lang`每個節點的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used for resolving DTD references.
trans-unit.target: 設定用來解析 DTD 參考的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlResolver" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see langword="XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: If set to <see langword="null" />, external resources are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為 <see langword="null" />，就不會解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the caller must be fully trusted in order to specify an <see langword="XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的 1.1 版中，必須完全信任呼叫端才能指定 <see langword="XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: The reader uses `XmlResolver` to resolve the location of the file loaded into the reader and also to resolve DTD references.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器會使用`XmlResolver`解析此位置的檔案讀取器會載入並解析 DTD 參考。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your XML included the DOCTYPE declaration, `<!DOCTYPE book SYSTEM book.dtd>` the reader resolves this external file and ensures that the DTD is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的 XML 包含 DOCTYPE 宣告中，`<!DOCTYPE book SYSTEM book.dtd>`讀取器會解析外部檔案，並確保 DTD 的格式是否正確。

trans-unit.source: The reader does not use the DTD for validation.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器不會使用 DTD 驗證。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at any time and takes effect on the next read operation.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可以隨時變更，而且會在下一步的讀取作業上生效。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `null`, any external DTD references encountered by the reader are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`null`，讀取器所遇到的任何外部 DTD 參考無法解析。

trans-unit.source: In version 1.1 of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 1.1 版中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，如果未設定這個屬性，應用程式的信任層級決定的預設行為。

trans-unit.source: `Fully trusted code:` The reader uses a default <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: `Fully trusted code:` 讀取器會使用預設值<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>不具使用者認證。

trans-unit.source: If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果驗證才能存取網路資源，使用`XmlResolver`屬性來指定`XmlResolver`具有必要認證。

trans-unit.source: `Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: `Semi-trusted code:` `XmlResolver`屬性設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: External resources are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 不會解析外部資源。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `XmlResolver` property to specify the credentials necessary to access the networked file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`XmlResolver`屬性來指定存取網路上的檔案所需的認證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <see langword="xml:space" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的 <see langword="xml:space" /> 範圍。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSpace" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSpace" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: If no <see langword="xml:space" /> scope exists, this property defaults to <see langword="XmlSpace.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="xml:space" /> 範圍不存在，這個屬性預設值為 <see langword="XmlSpace.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> instances by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to take advantage of new functionality.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，我們建議您先建立<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>所使用的執行個體<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以充分利用新功能。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses a file and returns significant white space if an `xml:space='preserve'` scope is found.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會剖析檔案，並傳回顯著泛空白字元，如果`xml:space='preserve'`找到範圍。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the file, `authors.xml`, as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用該檔案，`authors.xml`作為輸入。
